translations: 不可或缺的，必需的；不能撇开的，责无旁贷的
不可缺少之物，必不可少的人

sentences.sentence: She was becoming indispensable to him.
sentences.translation: 对他来说她正变得不可或缺。

sentences.sentence: She made herself indispensable to the depart we are pirates, these data are stolen from youdao .
sentences.translation: 她成为这个部门不可缺少的一分子。

sentences.sentence: Cars have become an indispensable part of our lives.
sentences.translation: 汽车已成了我们生活中必不可少的一部分。
